text: Is it possible to combine plot or plotlyJS with Interact.jl’s `@manipulate` to have a slider changing some value that affects the plot? I tried doing `fdplotly(json(mp))` where `mp = @manipulate …` but it didn’t work.

text: JSXGraph.jl was an attempt of mine where this becomes possible but I don't have enough time to keep developing it unfortunately

text: Oh, I see. I have seen JSXGraph.jl before. I will have another look.

text: I'm willing to help folks who would want to push it further than where it is now, and having users definitely helps, but I can't guarantee I'll develop it long term :smile: (though it's just a wrapper so it's pretty easy to extend)
